Packagist updated their download statistics, which make this project redundant. Check out Laravel's download statistics on packagist.org .

October 2019

Laravel v5.8 was the most popular version in October 2019. It has been downloaded 752'401 times. That's 29.8% of all downloads!

In total, Laravel has been downloaded 2'521'757 times this month.

How are these numbers calculated?
